stimulusHtml:
Part A

The functions g and h are given by

           g x = log 5 4 x - 2

           h x = sin - 1 8 x .

(i) Solve gx=3 for values of x in the domain of g.

(ii) Solve hx=π4 for values of x in the domain of h.

features.html:
Directions:

  • Unless otherwise specified, the domain of a function f is assumed to be the set of all real numbers x for which  f x  is a real number. Angle measures for trigonometric functions are assumed to be in radians.
  • Solutions to equations must be real numbers. Determine the exact value of any expression that can be obtained without a calculator. For example, log28, cosπ2, and  sin - 1 1  can be evaluated without a calculator.
  • Unless otherwise specified, combine terms using algebraic methods and rules for exponents and logarithms, where applicable. For example, 2x+3x, 52·53,  x 5 x 2 , and ln3+ln5 should be rewritten in equivalent forms.
  • For each part of the question, show the work that leads to your answers.

stimulusHtml:
Part B

The functions  j  and  k  are given by

             j ( x ) = ( sec x ) ( cot x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4AD6@

           k ( x ) = ( 16 3 x ) ⋅ 4 x 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4741@ .

(i) Rewrite  j (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamOAaiaayIW7caGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcaaaa@3C6D@  as an expression involving  sin x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaci4CaiaacMgacaGGUbGaaGjbVlaadIhaaaa@3CFA@  and no other trigonometric functions.

(ii) Rewrite  k(x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaam4AaiaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaaaa@3ADE@  as an expression of the form  4 ( ax+b ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DB8@ , where a and b are constants.

features.html:
Directions:

  • Unless otherwise specified, the domain of a function f is assumed to be the set of all real numbers x for which  f x  is a real number. Angle measures for trigonometric functions are assumed to be in radians.
  • Solutions to equations must be real numbers. Determine the exact value of any expression that can be obtained without a calculator. For example, log28, cosπ2, and  sin - 1 1  can be evaluated without a calculator.
  • Unless otherwise specified, combine terms using algebraic methods and rules for exponents and logarithms, where applicable. For example, 2x+3x, 52·53,  x 5 x 2 , and ln3+ln5 should be rewritten in equivalent forms.
  • For each part of the question, show the work that leads to your answers.

stimulusHtml:
Part C

The function m MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyBaaaa@388A@ is given by

           m ( x ) = 3 tan ( x + π 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@471A@ .

Find all input values in the domain of m MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyBaaaa@388A@ that yield an output value of 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbnLMBP9MBGaLCVbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacHOWxh9Jrpfey0dXdbba9q8qiW7rqarpfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vspeea0xc9Wrpe0=vr0=iq0xXdbba9pGe9FHe9aspf0xe9Fve9Fve9qapdbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyBaaaa@388A@ .
